com.persistit

Class VolumeSpecification

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.persistit.VolumeSpecification

  • public class VolumeSpecification
extends Object
    A structure holding all the specification details for a Volume.
    Author:
    peter

    • Constructor Detail

      • VolumeSpecification

        public VolumeSpecification(String path,
                   String name,
                   int pageSize,
                   long initialPages,
                   long maximumPages,
                   long extensionPages,
                   boolean create,
                   boolean createOnly,
                   boolean readOnly)
        Construct a VolumeSpecification having the supplied parameter values.
        Parameters:
        path - File system path to volume file
        name - Name of volume. If null the file name in the specified path is used.
        pageSize - Page size: one of 1024, 2048, 4096, 8192 or 6384
        initialPages - Initial page count
        maximumPages - Maximum page count
        extensionPages - Number of pages to extend by when file must grow
        create - true to allow creation of a new volume
        createOnly - true to require creation of a new volume
        readOnly - true to open volume file in read-only mode

      • VolumeSpecification

        public VolumeSpecification(String specification)
                    throws InvalidVolumeSpecificationException
        Construct a VolumeSpecification from the supplied specification string. The specification has the form:
        pathname[,options]...
        where options include:
        name
        The Volume name used in looking up the volume within Persistit programs (see Persistit.getVolume(String)). If the name attribute is not specified, the last name in the Volume's path name sequence is used instead.
        readOnly
        Open in Read-Only mode. (Incompatible with create mode.)
        create
        Creates the volume if it does not exist. Requires pageSize, initialPagesM, extensionPages and maximumPages to be specified.
        createOnly
        Creates the volume, or throw a VolumeAlreadyExistsException if it already exists.
        temporary
        Creates the a new, empty volume regardless of whether an existing volume file already exists.
        pageSize:NNN
        Specifies NNN as the volume's buffer size when creating a new volume. NNN must be 1024, 2048, 4096, 8192 or 16384.
        initialPages:NNN
        NNN is the initial number of pages to be allocated when this volume is first created.
        extensionPages:NNN
        NNN is the number of pages by which to extend the volume when more pages are required.
        maximumPages:NNN
        NNN is the maximum number of pages to which this volume can extend.

        Parameters:
        specification - the specification String
        Throws:
        InvalidVolumeSpecificationException
